nodes.text: Koracem Biliboth was an Ithorian male. At the time of the destruction of Alderaan, he worked as the chief archivist for the Chandrilan Embassy on Coruscant. Biliboth was killed when the imperial troops invaded the Embassy.
Koracem Biliboth was created by Philippe Rat for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "Il faut sauver Miss Pickalho" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli HS24.
